last_episode_to_air.name: The Only Creature I Couldn't Tame
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bárbara faces betrayal in court and only has Chelo by her side. Yet even in the darkest moments, a spark can ignite — and turn into a night of love.

name: Untameable
overview: In 1980s Spain, TV and movie star Bárbara Rey and circus personality Ángel Cristo fell for each other. This is the tale of their tumultuous relationship.

episodes.name: The Tamer's Skin
episodes.overview: Ángel Cristo is the world's best tamer, but his circus is drowning in debt. Bárbara Rey may be his best shot at new funds — and even something more.

episodes.name: The Don't Love Me
episodes.overview: Bárbara is dismissed by Juan Carlos, putting a damper on her birthday celebration. Ángel chases her to accept an invitation that can save his circus.

episodes.name: You Don't Dump a King
episodes.overview: Blasco's sneaky habits are uncovered. Ángel and Bárbara grow extremely close as they start working together, but Juan Carlos isn't ready to give up.

episodes.name: For Life
episodes.overview: Bárbara defies Chelo's plea for her to continue her glowing career and readies for a new life with Ángel, whose sinister side begins to surface.

episodes.name: A Lioness in the Cage
episodes.overview: As Bárbara's past comes after her, she aims to immerse herself further in the circus. Ángel is reluctant, even if she's the lifesaver he so needs.

episodes.name: The King's Whore
episodes.overview: As the couple continues to make waves, the circus encounters an opportunity that requires royal connections. Chelo attempts to open her friend's eyes.

episodes.name: A Night with Bárbara
episodes.overview: Debts, drugs and extreme violence make the situation unbearable. Once again, Bárbara must act swiftly to safeguard her family's future — and her own.

episodes.name: The Only Creature I Couldn't Tame
episodes.overview: Bárbara faces betrayal in court and only has Chelo by her side. Yet even in the darkest moments, a spark can ignite — and turn into a night of love.
